description:
A comfort collaboration with the underwear experts at BN3TH. Designed for training days, comfy everyday, the Pro Ionic Boxer Briefs use a light recycled blend that wicks away moisture and is infused with a permanent anti-odour technology. The MyPakage 3D pouch supports and cradles you from every angle, and a pucker panel eliminates seams in sensitive areas.

  • Ionic+™ permanent silver anti-odour treatment prevents smells
  • MyPakage technology 3-dimensional pouch provides excellent support
  • Pucker panel ensures your sensitive areas stay comfortable
  • Premium waistband is sewn directly to the body for long-lasting durability
  • Low-profile flat-locked seams lay comfortably against your skin
  • 6.5 in. inseam
  • Trim athletic fit
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: MEC x BN3TH Pro Ionic Boxer Briefs - Men's
